Name: DeadShotZ
About the game: In this desolate world a lone survivor try to stay alive by destroying the hordes of zombies that never seems to end! No one knows what really happened, only that they never stops comming. They are fast, they are tireless, and they want flesh. A frenetic arcade game with non-stopping action. Easy to learn with simple mechanics. Do your best to survive! Destroy the enemies, try to find coins and buy new weapons and first-aid kits on The Merchant. 6 different enemies. Each with it's difficulty and environment. 6 different weapons. Each one with it's own playstyle. 90s inspired graphics. Countless randomly generated levels in 6 different areas/themes. Each with different elements. Game always updated with free content and improvements for life!
